Address.value: 2118 WALSH AVENUE,SUITE 210, SANTA CLARA, California, 95050, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: HeartBeam Inc is a medical technology company primarily focusing on telemedicine solutions that enable the detection and monitoring of cardiac disease outside a healthcare facility setting. Its initial focus is providing diagnostic data to help physicians with care management of patients with cardiovascular disease.
